rules.name: myRule_28
rules.label: Product: Last Time Buy Date is approaching

rules.name: myRule_30
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND (9 OR 10 OR 11) AND (12 OR 13) AND 14
rules.label: Product: Missing documents required for ES Gate

rules.name: myRule_34
rules.label: Product: Notify shop product to EOL

rules.name: myRule_37
rules.label: Product Status mismatch the gate dates (EOL/PCN Issue Date passed)

rules.name: myRule_39
rules.label: Product Status mismatch the gate dates (ES Availability Date passed)

rules.name: myRule_41
rules.label: Product Status mismatch the gate dates (IP Availability Date passed)

rules.name: myRule_43
rules.label: Product Status mismatch the gate dates (MP Availability Date passed)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_13
formula_myRule_15

value.stringValue: AND( ISNEW(), CONTAINS([Product2].CreatedBy.Username, "Automatic"), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "ADP")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "C027")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "C16")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-C")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-G")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-L")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-U")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "FW27")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "FW75")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "LEON")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "LISA")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "MPCI")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "SALA")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "TOBY")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "ACC-")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-O")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-R")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-W")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OBC")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OBI")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OBS")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "ODIN")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OLCI")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OLP")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OLS")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OWL")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "OWS")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "PBS")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "PZC")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "RBE")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "RBS")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "RWE")), NOT(CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "WDK")) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISNEW(), CONTAINS([Product2].CreatedBy.Username, "Automatic"), OR( CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "ADP"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "C027"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "C16"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-C"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-G"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-L"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-U"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "EVK-R"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "FW27"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "FW75"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "LEON"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "LISA"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "MPCI"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "SARA"), CONTAINS([Product2].Name, "TOBY") ))

formulas.expression: AND( ISNEW(), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.Username}, "Automatic"), OR( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "WDK"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "PZC"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "PBS"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OWS"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OWL"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OLS"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OLP"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OLCI"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OBS"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OBI"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "OBC"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "EVK-W"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "EVK-O"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "ACC-"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "WB"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "LILY"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "EMMY"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "ELLA"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Name}, "ODIN") ) )

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Product2].Product_Owner__c)), [Product2].EOL_PCN_Issue_Date__c < TODAY(), NOT(ISBLANK([Product2].EOL_PCN_Issue_Date__c)), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( [Product2].Product_Status__c , 'End of Life' ), ISPICKVAL( [Product2].Product_Status__c , 'Obsolete' ) )), OR( ISNEW() , OR( ISCHANGED([Product2].Product_Owner__c), ISCHANGED([Product2].EOL_PCN_Issue_Date__c ) , ISCHANGED([Product2].Product_Status__c ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_37
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Product_Owner__c})), {!myVariable_current.EOL_PCN_Issue_Date__c} < TODAY(), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.EOL_PCN_Issue_Date__c})), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Product_Status__c} , 'End of Life' ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Product_Status__c} , 'Obsolete' ) )), OR( ISNEW() , OR( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Owner__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.EOL_PCN_Issue_Date__c} ) , ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Status__c} ) ) ) )

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Product2].Product_Owner__c)), [Product2].ES_Availability_Date__c < TODAY(), NOT(ISBLANK([Product2].ES_Availability_Date__c)), NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL([Product2].Product_Status__c, 'Engineering Samples'), ISPICKVAL([Product2].Product_Status__c, 'Initial Production'), ISPICKVAL([Product2].Product_Status__c, 'Mass Production'), ISPICKVAL([Product2].Product_Status__c, 'End of Life'), ISPICKVAL([Product2].Product_Status__c, 'Obsolete') )), OR( ISNEW() , OR( ISCHANGED([Product2].Product_Owner__c), ISCHANGED([Product2].ES_Availability_Date__c ) , ISCHANGED([Product2].Product_Status__c ) ) ) )
